markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Subjective Truth](/Feats.aspx?ID=2090) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 197 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Vigilante](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=80)

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5); [Vigilante Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2083)

</column>

---

Your disparate identities allow you to defeat magic that detects lies. As long as what you say is true from the point of view of your current identity, you can say it even under effects like [_zone of truth_](/Spells.aspx?ID=379) that force you to speak the truth.
name: Subjective Truth
